content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime city center location and the excellent facilities, I believe 550 Euro would be a fair and reasonable price for this 50 square meter, one-bedroom, newly-built but unfurnished apartment. If it's not, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm aiming for the most affordable deal.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is too low for my satisfaction.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
